capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape does have an eagle-hooked nose, you know. It's quite distinctive. I've always found it a bit... striking. (pauses) But, to be honest, I'm not sure I'd call it beautiful or anything. The whole 'villainous' vibe he gives off doesn't exactly scream 'handsome'.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly "the boy who lived" - a legend in his own right. I mean, can you imagine being famous for surviving a killing curse as a baby? It's just incredible. And the fact that he went on to become an Auror and fight against the Dark Lord... it's just amazing.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of him before, but i just learned that he's also known as harry potter!

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly the boy who lived, and it's incredible to think about what he went through at Hogwarts.
